import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; function SectionCandicateBasicInfo() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ Name: '', Website: '', Qualification: '', Language: '', Jobcategory: '', Experience: '', Currentsalery: '', Expectedsalery: '', Age: '', Country: '', City: '', Postcode: '', Fulladdress: '', Description: '', }); // Handle form field change const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prevData => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value, })); }; // Handle form submission const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await axios.post('/update-candidate-info', formData, { withCredentials: true }); if (response.status === 200) { alert('Information updated successfully'); } } catch (err) { console.error(err); alert('Error updating information'); } }; return (
